story.1: Long ago, when the Europeans first came to India, they were amazed by the wonderful spices, silk, and precious stones that they found there. They discovered a sea route that would take them straight to the treasures they sought.

So, the Europeans decided to find a new way to get to the East by sailing across the sea. Portugal and Spain got help from other countries like Genoa and even the north Europeans to make this happen.

They thought this would help them attack the Muslims from two sides.
